column4: Hi, I have 2 lucid lynx boxes that seem to hang at fsck during startup - is there any way I can disable it/ find out what is wrong with it?
do you edit the grub boot command and remove the "quiet" from it?  Or try booting in "single" (or recovery? can't remember what it's called)
best of luck!  it should show the text version of what's going on.  try the single/recovery one first
